Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.servertoclient.supportclass

Class DevelopmentCardToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.servertoclient.supportclass.DevelopmentCardToClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DevelopmentCardToClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class contains the information of the development card to send to the client. This object could be only read from the client.
Author:
Stefano Fossati
See Also:
DevelopmentCard, Serializable, Serialized Form

    Constructs the development card to send to the client with its information.

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentCardToClient

      public DevelopmentCardToClient​(java.lang.String cardID, java.lang.String color, int level, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> cost, int victoryPoint, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> materialRequired, java.util.Map<ProductedMaterials,​java.lang.Integer> productionResult)
      Constructs the development card to send to the client with its information.
      Parameters:
      cardID - The ID of the card.
      color - The color of the development card.
      level - The level of the development card
      cost - The cost to buy this development card.
      victoryPoint - The victory points that this card give at the end of the match, to the player that buy this development card.
      materialRequired - The material required to activate the production of this development card.
      productionResult - The material give by the activation of the development card production.
